gt_text: 'Ouvre la porte'. 'Respire profondément'. 'Laisse ton monde'. 'Entre dans celui de quelqu’un d’autre'.
juding_criteria:
Output from Part 2:

*   Four concrete steps
*   Graffiti-style French text on the first step: "Ouvre la porte"
*   Graffiti-style French text on the second step: "Respire profondément"
*   Graffiti-style French text on the third step: "Laisse ton monde"
*   Graffiti-style French text on the fourth step: "Entre dans celui de quelqu’un d’autre"
*   An old library entrance (or building facade suggesting an old library)
*   A worn hardcover book
*   Book resting on the top (fourth) step
*   Faded, unreadable title on the book
